Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: nana
Reviews.Content: I chose this phone for my 12 year old grandson.  He had one that got smashed by a truck running over it.  Before it got smashed, the grandson left it outside in West Virginia.  For several months.  After it was dried, it worked just fine.  This is a talk and text phone that I think is perfect for young people.  It is rugged and can take abuse.  The battery lasts a reasonable amount of time.  It has served my grandson very well.  I would certainly recommend this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Waste of Money
Reviews.Author: Becca
Reviews.Content: I'd only had this phone for a few months when it became impossible to hold a normal conversation because with nearly every call, the other person would complain about my voice cutting out and becoming extremely muffled and faint. On top of that, the phone kept dropping calls left and right (in areas of my home and neighborhood where previous phones had no problem whatsoever). Both of these problems got worse over time. Figuring the phone was defective, I sent it in to Verizon and they gave me a replacement (same model). The new one started okay but quickly developed the same problems, which only grew worse and worse over the next few months. Conclusion: this is a crappy phone and not worth your money.

Reviews.Title: This is better than buying a new cell phone
Reviews.Author: cooztinye
Reviews.Content: If you have a need for a replacement phone, and just need basic talk and text capabilities, this is a great phone for you!

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: Julie
Reviews.Content: It's a great phone. It was easy to get it activated on my Verizon account. It was definitely worth the money

Reviews.Title: battery is a problem
Reviews.Author: Tony Russell
Reviews.Content: I like the phone. It does what I need it to. The problem is the battery. The one sent with the phone would not charge.  I sent for a replacement battery and it only lasted a week.

Reviews.Title: excellent upgrade from an old cell phone
Reviews.Author: Janice K.
Reviews.Content: i can text a whole lot easier than on my old phone. it also enables me to get the weather on my phone, connect to facebook and email, without the cost of a smart phone.

Reviews.Title: Yea! No contract and no Smart phone.
Reviews.Author: keith n talbert
Reviews.Content: My old LG EnV phone was on it's last. Only one hinge still functioning. Glad to find this replacement. Handles the phone calls and texting I use regularly without all the added expense a Smart phone has for features I don't use. Also able to purchase without another two year committment to the phone service. I will probably say with Verizon the next several years, but who wants to be locked into a contract so you Have to.

Reviews.Title: Phone worked just like it said in the ad and was easy to add to my account>
Reviews.Author: Grass hopper
Reviews.Content: Phone works good , easy to read and functions just like it should. I bought this for my mother-in-law and shefound it easy to use as well. I liked the look and functions of the phone.

Reviews.Title: NOT COMPATABLE WITH BLUETOOTH
Reviews.Author: teh umpire
Reviews.Content: LG KNOWS THERE IS A PROBLEM BETWEEN THIS PHONE AND BLUETOOTH DEVICES.  LG IS TRYING TO CORRECT SOFTWARE PROBLEMS BUT CORRECTED YET AND NO DATE WHEN SOFTWARE UPDATES WILL BE AVAILABLE

Reviews.Title: Beloved Basic Phone
Reviews.Author: I am so smart...S-M-R-T
Reviews.Content: As a Generation Y-er, you'd think at the age of 22 I'd already blitzed through 3 smartphones by now. However, I haven't, and up until three months ago, this ol' girl had been my telecommunication source for three years.I like to ramble, so let's get the basic summaries out of the way first.PRO'S:>Damn near indestructible>Great reception in most mountain-y parts of the western U.S./outdoor places/etc>Love the QWERTY board.>Camera quality not bad for tiny phone.>Very reliable.>Good quality sound. Speakerphone worked reasonably well.CON'S>Did not appear to enjoy making calls in basements or underground areas.>A bit slower as the years progressed>Miserable internal memory.>Tiny screen meant that I couldn't enjoy some of the photos I took myself on the phone or received from others.SUMMATION: At its heart, this old girl did what a phone was meant to do back in the day: take and make reliable calls, text quickly and efficiently and survive all the abuse you could throw at it. I could wax poetic about this little phone. It was not of regal blood like an iPhone or Droid, but it served its purpose reliably for over three years. In my book, that's not half bad. If you want a basic phone with no heartache, and love the wonder of texting with QWERTY, LG Cosmos is a great, inexpensive option.

Reviews.Title: A saving grace!
Reviews.Author: suzanne
Reviews.Content: My husband likes this phone and put his through the wash cycle. Thankfully I found it here. It has worked great. No problems at all. I'll be back for another soon, but not because of quality!!

Reviews.Title: I love my phone
Reviews.Author: Shara M. Boyes "s.boyes"
Reviews.Content: This is my second time I have purchased this phone. I love this phone. First phone didn't die or break I accidently washed my old one in with my clothes .  So no its not water proof ..lol  But I have dropped my old one several time and it never cracked or broke. That's why i bought this one ( the same exact kind) .No its no IPhone but its perfect for me. I can take pictures and text. If  anyone needs something easy & inexpensive then this is good for others.

Reviews.Title: Nice basic phone
Reviews.Author: FL Z-Man 777 "Bass Man"
Reviews.Content: We've had LG basic phones for many years, the Cosmos 2 has nice speakerphone capability.  Getting MP3s to play and file storage maneuvers can be a bit tricky if you're not so tech savvy...

Reviews.Title: My 3rd LG Cosmos 2 is malfunctioning after 10 days!
Reviews.Author: Raymond Dubuque "founder of Liberals Like Christ"
Reviews.Content: My first LG Cosmos 2 worked great for about 2 years. Then it developed problems and Verizon replaced it. The next one worked great for about 9 months.  Then it refused to make contact with people I was trying to call. So I brought the phone back to Verizon and again they replaced it.  But My 3rd LG Cosmos 2 is malfunctioning after 10 days! It's not calling out consistently, and now it's not even receiving calls properly.  Although it looks brand new, it's not working as well as the phone it replaced!

Reviews.Title: Makes a Great Spare Phone
Reviews.Author: Mark E. Detwiler
Reviews.Content: Worked as expected on the Verizon network. My son broke his previous phone and we needed something to replace it.

Reviews.Title: great phone
Reviews.Author: Michelle Nyquist
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mother as she cannot work smart phones and she loves it. She is not techy so this is a great fit for her. The battery is great, she goes about 3 days with normal use in between charges.

Reviews.Title: Applications keep popping up.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: It's OK, but apps keeps popping up and they can't be shut off unless you return it to the manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: great phone,nice price. beats getting it from Veizon for twice the price.
Reviews.Author: Michael Mohl
Reviews.Content: Great phone at a great price. Beats getting it from Veizon for twice the price. Everything came as if it was purchased at the store.

Reviews.Title: quality
Reviews.Author: pat
Reviews.Content: Happy with the service and delivery time, but this phone does not work as good as my original same phone purchased new from Verizon........The phone intermittently will turn off, the phone keyboard when pushed to use will flash odd items and battery runs out much faster than original new phone.........thank you

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: LOUIS PALUMBO
Reviews.Content: The phone keeps locking, even if you don't want it locked. The keys are closer together than I would have liked,OH WELL

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Jerry Parker
Reviews.Content: I ordered two cell phones. One phone works the other doesn't. I'm new to Amazon and have no idea how to exchange the inoperable phone.

Reviews.Title: very good phone
Reviews.Author: LucyB
Reviews.Content: I love it very good small cool awesome it is good for its price my favorite phone and i like the way its shaped

Reviews.Title: LC D broke can't activate phone
Reviews.Author: Fritz
Reviews.Content: The LCD quit 1 month after purchase. It took 2 months to repair. I could not activate it. The guy at the local verizon store could not get it to both send and receive. When it finaly was activated, it was on a different phone number. It was no longer listed on my original phone number. I tried to have it transfered back to my original phone number. Verizon refused to do it without the account security code or the answer to my secret question. I kept typing in the info for my original phone. I checked the info for my original number online. Verizon locked the computer for my new phone number. I called up Verizon. They ask me the wrong security question. What is the name of my first pet? I never had a first pet. The security question I always use is the name of my first school. The security code I always use is the same as my debit card. I paid 300 $ for this phone a year ago and I can't use it. I talked to the people at verizon several times. I have spent more than two hours talking to them. The phone still will not receive calls on my original number.Verizon is useless.

Reviews.Title: Wish I Had Ordered Sooner
Reviews.Author: Wannabee "Wannabee"
Reviews.Content: I had this exact phone and it died right before our contract was up. Wanted to research plan prices before setting up a new 2 year contract. This phone enabled me to do just that. It came in two days and it looks brand new. I set it up online within minutes and was using it that evening. I am not a heavy cell phone user but I do keep it on vibrate most of the day. The battery charge lasted over a week. I really do wish I had ordered sooner because my cell phone was dead for a few weeks before I made the purchase. Now I can relax and choose a decent plan without feeling rushed!

Reviews.Title: Phone looks good
Reviews.Author: Johnny Q
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement phone because my daughter lost her smart phone.  The phone works as described and it's perfect to talk on the phone and text as well.

Reviews.Title: Couldn't get this price at the Verizon store
Reviews.Author: Neil F. Mayes "Neil Mayes"
Reviews.Content: This works as advertised, although there is a newer model out.  Absolutely no trouble in getting it activated over the phone onto my existing account.

Reviews.Title: LG Cosmos 2 Verizon Wireless Slider Keyboard Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Dawn Rush
Reviews.Content: I love it!  It works perfectly and I have recommended to my friends.My phone I replaced (Samsung) would not hold a charge.  Replaced the battery (didn't help), replaced the phone (didn't help) so decided to go with the LG that was similar and I have been totally satisfied.  No problem with holding a charge.

Reviews.Title: LG VN251 VN 251 COSMOS 2 Verizon Wireless Slider Keyboard Bluetooth Cell...
Reviews.Author: David Brian Gurley
Reviews.Content: I am very happy about  LG VN251 VN 251 COSMOS 2 Verizon Wireless Slider Keyboard Bluetooth Cell... Thank you reguards

Reviews.Title: LG phone
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Ash
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is in Very good shape and condition as stated in ad on Amazon.  I am happy with purchase

Reviews.Title: Verizon Cosmos Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: Yvonne
Reviews.Content: Phone arrived in excellent condition and it worked perfect.  I wanted a cell phone for my son and I didn't want a smart phone, it was great to be able to find a phone for him on the Verizon website.

Reviews.Title: Bought this for my son.
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth rebelo
Reviews.Content: This is a great little phone for the price, got this for my son, phone is compatible with Verizon which was great.  Really great phone.

Reviews.Title: Will not work
Reviews.Author: Gerald Armstrong
Reviews.Content: Purchased this phone and took it to Verizon Wireless. They could not make it work at all. Do not purchase this item it is not recommended.

Reviews.Title: The product is defected.
Reviews.Author: ramin nassiri
Reviews.Content: I received the cellphone. The phone is defected. The battery doesn't charge. I had to return the phone. I'm extremely disappointed.

Reviews.Title: very very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Marra
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone for my son who was living for college less than 4 month the phone doesn't charge I couldn't get in touch with him unless he ask to use someone else phone.

ProductInfo.Name: LG VN251 VN 251 COSMOS 2 Verizon Wireless Slider Keyboard Bluetooth Cell Phone
